topProducts.name: Pizza
topProducts.description: Consistently praised as 'fantastic', 'amazing', and 'tasty'. Specific popular versions mentioned include the 'Luce' (house special), 'Classic', and 'Jalapeño Popper'. The crust is frequently highlighted as a positive feature.
quotes: Usually a delivery customer, we  went to the Pizza Luce on 4th and 2nd Ave
Horrible pizza and poor ownership and social media team

topProducts.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
topProducts.description: Described as 'awesome' and served with a marinara sauce that is 'spot on'. One review mentioned their daughter ordered a second round because it was so good.
quotes: Our cheesy garlic bread was awesome

topProducts.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
topProducts.description: Considered 'good', though one reviewer noted it was a 'little on the salty side'.
quotes: The Spinach Artichoke Dip was good, but a little on the salty side

topProducts.name: Beer Selection
topProducts.description: Features a 'nice selection of tap beers'. Customers appreciate the variety, with one mentioning Guinness specifically.

topProducts.name: Mostaccioli
topProducts.description: Mentioned as being a 'great' pasta dish.

topProducts.name: Jalapeño Popper Pizza
topProducts.description: A specialty pizza described as 'delicious', especially when fresh from the oven. One customer recommended adding chicken.
quotes: The jalapeño popper pizza (adding chicken) was delicious - especially seconds out of the oven

topProducts.name: Spicy Pesto Pasta
topProducts.description: A winter special that was described as 'delicious'.
quotes: The winter special, a spicy pesto pasta, was delicious

topProducts.name: Ultimate Veggie Vegan Hoagie
topProducts.description: A vegan sandwich option. One review was highly critical, stating the toppings were sparse and poorly prepared.
quotes: I had the Ultimate Veggie vegan hoagie

highlightedReviews.author: John Berrigan
highlightedReviews.text: Usually a delivery customer, we  went to the Pizza Luce on 4th and 2nd Ave. The jalapeño popper pizza (adding chicken) was delicious - especially seconds out of the oven. The cocktails were great, the seating comfy, and the service was attentive and had us laughing with all the great humor. Great vibe.

highlightedReviews.author: Ben Mosbarger
highlightedReviews.text:
What a great place to spend time eating delicious pizza. The atmosphere is fantastic and welcoming.

Our server was so kind and helpful. She said she’s been there for 12 years because it’s such a good place to work.

I was visiting from out of town, first time to Minneapolis. This place came recommended by the hotel staff and I am so grateful.

highlightedReviews.author: A B
highlightedReviews.text:
I absolutely love pizza luce, the pizza is sincerely delicious and very reasonably priced, the staff is more than courteous, they are down right amazing.
I missed my transfer on the greyhound, and they were sympathetic and kind , hospitable and incredibly courteous. Its a shame i dont live in minneapolis, id hit up pizza luce at least 3 times a week if not more.

highlightedReviews.author: Jon Hanson
highlightedReviews.text:
A lot of places are closed in downtown Minneapolis late on a Sunday night. This place was open. It had a lot of selections for food, drinks and a full bar.

The pizza was better than most I've had in the area.

I highly recommend stopping by if your staying downtown near the twins stadium and looking for a good place to finish off the night with a bite to eat and a closing time drink with your friends before you call it a night!

highlightedReviews.author: Scar’s Perspective
highlightedReviews.text:
Pizza Luce was highly recommended. I would say overall, it was okay. The Spinach Artichoke Dip was good, but a little on the salty side. We ordered the Classic Pizza and it was good. Loved the crust.

Our server was just meh. I asked for recommendations on a local beer and he asked which ones on the menu I wanted. He couldn’t give a good recommendation. He was also slow. We had to track him down to get our check and again to pay. He only had 2 tables of people to serve.

highlightedReviews.author: Jennifer Pennington
highlightedReviews.text: Loved the Moscow Mule made with Du Nord Foundation Vodka - it was bright and refreshing, the perfect sidekick to a classic cheese pizza. Our bartender, Alex, nailed it—friendly, fast, and made sure we had everything we needed. And to top it all off? The Espresso Martini made with Du Nord’s Café Frieda Coffee Liqueur, finished with a touch of chocolate—the perfect dessert drink! Cheers to Pizza Lucé for showing love to Du Nord Social Spirits! As a proud member of Team Du Nord, I’ll always raise a glass to this awesome partnership!

highlightedReviews.author: Destiny Benson
highlightedReviews.text:
Phenomenal food does not begin to describe our experience. The Luce pizza was amazing. The winter special, a spicy pesto pasta, was delicious. The pretzel was fluffy. Mustard tasted like something was missing, but was still delicious.

The bartender taking care of us provided excellent service.

We are in town for 5 days and we will be making sure we visit at least once more while here.

highlightedReviews.author: Jessica Certain
highlightedReviews.text: Loved our experience! We found this gem after an event at the Orpheum Theatre. It's a quick walk! Our cheesy garlic bread was awesome! The marinara was spot on. We loved it so much, my daughter ordered another round! We had slices of yummy pizza  too. The cute place had a fabulous selection of beers on tap, I ordered a couple Guinness. Our bartender was awesome, didn't catch his name but thought someone called him Wylie.  We would love to come back when we are in the city next visit

highlightedReviews.author: Kelsey Ryan
highlightedReviews.text:
I ordered this for take out. I was having issues with the website and it kept giving me an error message when trying to order to my hotel. My friend and I called the restaurant and they were able to assist us.

This is the third time I’ve had Pizza Luce and all times have been excellent. I like the classic a lot and the Athena. At the twins stadium they have a pickle one I really want to try.

Pizza Luce also does seasonal pizza which is fun!

highlightedReviews.author: Erin Michelli
highlightedReviews.text: Loved loved loved the pizza here! Its hard to find really good food at 2am and this place did not disappoint. The delivery is pretty quick, too. During my 4 day stay in Minneapolis, I think I ate here 2 of the days, and I ate my leftovers the other 2 days :) I wish there was one of these in my city.
